name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Python Engineer with 10+ years of experience in full-stack software development, specializing in **Python**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **React**, **Angular**, and **VueJS**. Expert in building and deploying cloud-native applications using **Docker** and proficient in applying modern software development practices including Test Driven Development and Code Review. Proven ability to design and develop high-performance applications that leverage AI/ML technologies for intelligent decision-making and real-time analytics.
Demonstrated expertise in leading enterprise projects while ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. A strong advocate for efficient development processes with solid experience in CI/CD automation, microservices architecture, and event-driven systems. Passionate about creating impactful software solutions and fostering a culture of collaboration and clear communication.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and maintained scalable web applications using **Python**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **React** (17–18), ensuring high performance and optimal user experience in diverse domains such as finance and healthcare.
• Employed **Docker** for containerization and orchestration, streamlining deployment processes across **9** different environments and reducing deployment time by **30%**.
• Led projects in microservices architecture with **Kubernetes** (AKS/EKS) and serverless methods using **AWS Lambda**, achieving a **99.9%** uptime and improving system resilience.
• Designed and implemented RESTful API services with **Node.js** and **Flask**, facilitating seamless integration with front-end frameworks like **VueJS** and **Angular**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance application performance, utilizing agile methodologies and transparent communication to meet project deadlines.
• Conducted code reviews and maintained best practices in **Test Driven Development** (TDD), ensuring **95%** code coverage and reducing bugs by **40%** during production rolls.
• Developed real-time data processing systems powered by **Docker**, enhancing the user experience with live data feed integration.
• Actively participated in technical discussions and communicated effectively with stakeholders to align project goals with business objectives.
• Executed continuous integration and delivery pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, automating testing and deployment processes and minimizing release cycles by **20%**.
• Integrated data-driven decision-making features with advanced analytics, contributing to insights on customer engagement and market trends.

Utilized **Python** and **JavaScript** to architect and modernize financial platforms, employing a microservices-based architecture with **Node.js** and **NestJS**, which improved scalability and maintainability, handling up to **1M transactions/hour**.
Designed and developed dynamic, user-centric front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **TypeScript**, leveraging **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to enhance user interface performance across financial dashboards, achieving a **30% decrease** in load times.
Engineered real-time transaction monitoring tools and analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to process and analyze over **2M transactions** weekly, providing critical insights.
Implemented event-driven architecture utilizing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, facilitating asynchronous communication and boosting transaction processing efficiency by **25%**.
Orchestrated ETL pipelines with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, allowing seamless ingestion and processing of financial data from over **50 internal and third-party sources**, accommodating both batch and real-time analytics.
Developed AI/ML-driven fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, which improved anomaly detection, flagging suspicious activities with **95% accuracy**.
Created machine learning pipelines for various financial applications such as credit scoring and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference into backend services for enhanced decision-making processes.

• Developed scalable backend services using **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) for a global e-commerce platform, achieving **99.9%** uptime and low latency across critical services such as checkout and order fulfillment.
• Engineered event-driven architecture utilizing **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** for real-time features, resulting in a **30%** improvement in order update responsiveness and dynamic inventory tracking.
• Created frontend applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, implementing **TypeScript** and **Redux Toolkit** to deliver responsive user experiences, optimizing load time by **40%** on both web and mobile platforms.
• Managed distributed data storage leveraging **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra**, ensuring fault-tolerant access with a **50%** reduction in database read pressure through effective caching strategies.
• Integrated AI/ML recommendation systems with **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**, which resulted in a **25%** increase in conversion rates by personalizing product listings based on user behavior.
• Implemented advanced caching with **Redis** for product metadata and sessions, significantly enhancing application responsiveness and supporting **10,000+** daily active users without performance degradation.
• Adopted feature flags and blue-green deployment strategies using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes**, enabling controlled rollouts and reducing risk during major updates with a **95%** success rate on deployments.
• Designed responsive, SEO-friendly UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, ensuring mobile-first engagement while complying with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1).
• Built secure and compliant payment workflows with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring adherence to PCI standards in handling sensitive transactions over the last **3** years.
• Enforced role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, maintaining **GDPR** compliance for user data protection and ensuring secure access for both customers and admins.
